posts.lightText: winners whose names will live on
posts.paraTextone: Often the competitiveness of a Concours d’Elegance forces the restoration of a vehicle to surpass ‘mint’ condition, mint condition would be the state of the vehicle when it originally left the factory.
posts.paraTexttwo: These winners are our community's proud members who managed to bring their prized jaguars up to the standard required for this competition, immortalizing both their names and the jaguars.
